author: dmitrijus
body:
Implements 'keepBackup' option in the file saver for online DQM.

If the option is set, the backup files (which are usually made every 15
lumisections) will not be deleted once a new backup is made.

This way it is possible to retrieve 'history' of the online DQM application.

Also adds 'dt4ml' client - an example how this new option can be used.
title: Online DQM fix for ML applications.
